snippet: A 17-year-old boy and a 14-year-old girl were struck shortly before 3 p.m. near Bushwick Avenue and Grand Street in Williamsburg; their injuries were not believed to be life-threatening.
abstract: Teenage boy and girl are shot and wounded near Progress High School for Professional Careers in Brooklyn; no arrests are made but onlookers say about 15 young people were fighting before shots rang out.

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and DAN GLAUN

lead_paragraph: A 17-year-old boy and a 14-year-old girl were struck shortly before 3 p.m. near Bushwick Avenue and Grand Street in Williamsburg; their injuries were not believed to be life-threatening.

headline.main: 2 Teenagers Shot Near Brooklyn High School
headline.print_headline: 2 Teenagers Shot Near a Brooklyn School

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Progress High School for Professional Careers (Brooklyn, NY)
